name: Shaping
description:
A prototype of a short plateformer game we as students in Game Design had to make in a week. I don't plan on working on  this game (maybe not yet), i'm just placing it here so people can see  and play what i've made during my studies as a Game Designer. The game is short but i hope you like the "feel" of the visuals !

(PS : the left  key is Q  because my keyboard is french so it's normal if it's not A)
